name: Universal Style Guide
description:
Universal Style Guide

You can use this document or boilerplate to set style guides of colors, typography, icons and more easily and quickly


thanks for some tools, wireframe opensource and figma plugins


Update Atomic Design 350+ Component:

  1. Button Auto Layout & Variant Components
  2. Checkbox
  3. Input Field Auto Layout & Variant Components
  4. Avatar
  5. Tags
  6. Radio Button
  7. Increment and Decrement Button
  8. Table Responsive
